title: CONSOLIDATION OF DPW FACILITIES @1833 W. VIRGINIA
description: 1.Construction of a New 3 story, above ground Office Building, @ 12,000 sq. ft. per floor: 36,000 sq. ft.  Total ;( FY/15 Phase I and Phase II Planning, Design and Environmental). (FY /20 Phase III Construction)    2.Construction of New 360 space, 3 story 311,000 sq., parking structure. (FY/15 Phase I and Phase II, Planning, Design and Environmental). (FY 19 - FY 20, Phase lll Construction)     3.Construction of New 80 space, 2 story 37,827 sq., parking structure.FY/15, Phase I and Phase II, Planning, Design & Environ).  (FY 19 - FY 20, Phase III Construction)
justification: DPW is in jeopardy of being relocated from the Reeves Center for Economic Development and the South Capitol yard is being consumed by the trolley repair yard.  This will allow DPW operations to consolidate in one quadrant of the City.
